thread.title: London trip
thread.title_full: London trip - Review of The Grosvenor Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: KingaBrett
title: London trip
text:
We travel from Ireland my husband booked the hotel for us as a birthday surprise .... the hotel suppose to be classy comfortable and friendly....
Now I have to say I like my comfort and I don't mind to pay for it but this hotel was well overrateed and too pricey for nothing really
the room we stayed wasn't clean the beds were looked like they were just made few minutes before we check in not comfy at all pillows were smelly ...
There was little fridge in the room with just 2 bottles of water and wait for it we couldn't even open it milk for tea was old, and just 2 bags of tea in old drawers...
We were happy myself and my 8 year old daughter to visit London and go for show but after traveling for so many hours you just need a bit of a comfort a nice cup of tea a shower and strache on clean bed after the show we ask for something to eat and small drink we have been refused ....
I think for that price they could do more for a customer they could be more welcome....
I think beacouse we just stay for one night they didn't care but still customer is a customer doesn't matter how many nights you booking in for should be treated as a special guest I was looking forward to spend some bonding time with my girl the only bonus was a Wicked show our stay in the hotel was poor I will not recommended it
Kind regards
Room Tip: Not a nice view and dirty See more room tips
